Belgium: New edict requiring printers and booksellers to provide local magistrates with inventories of their stock.
Colombia: King Carlos V appointed Santa Fe de Bogot√° the title of city
India:
Battle of Kannauj fought between Humayun and Sher Shah Suri and Humayun was completely defeated. Humayun lost the Mughal empire to Afghans (Suri Dynasty), and passed 12 years in exile.
Birth of Maharana Pratap Singh of Mewar ( son of Maharana Udai Singh II )
Malta: Increasingly frequent razzias on Malta and Italy by Ottomans and Barbary pirates. (to 1551)
Sweden: First full Swedish translation of Bible, the Gustav Vasa Bible, published
